content: --- title: Aircraft Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-07-25T08:27:56.398Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:35:31.969Z --- # Aircraft Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :--------------- | :--------: | :--------------------------------------------------------- | | regId | `'string'` | Registration number of aircraft | | startDate | `'dateTime'` | Start date and time of the validity of the aircraft in UTC | | endDate | `'dateTime'` | End date and time of the validity of the aircraft in UTC | | acType | `'string'` | Type of aircraft. e.g. 737 | | subtype | `'string'` | Subtype of aircraft. e.g. 737-800 | | customizedType | `'string'` | Airline specific type of aircraft. e.g. 73A | | nameOfAircraft | `'string'` | Name of aircraft. e.g. Antalya | | numberOfSeats | `'number'` | Number of seats | | registrar | `'string'` | Country of registration | | owner | `'string'` | Owner | | contract | `'string'` | Contract of aircraft procurement. e.g. Wetlease / Drylease | | phoneNumber | `'string'` | Aircraft's phone number | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Aircraft Rotation Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | regId | `'string'` | Registration id of aircraft | | actype | `'string'` | Type of aircraft. e.g. 737 | | subtype | `'string'` | Subtype of aircraft. e.g. 737-800 | | startTime | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the rotation in UTC | | endTime | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the rotation in UTC | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Aircraft Flight Duty Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | legId | `'string'` | Flight leg id | | regId | `'string'` | Registration id of aircraft | | rotId | `'string'` | Rotation id | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Aircraft Ground Duty Data Model
